item.title: How to Apply for a New Ration Card Online
item.description: How to Apply for a New Ration Card Online From Birth to Death! Government Documents / Services - Guidebook Ration card is a very important document for all people in Tamil Nadu. In the past, people used to spend many hours going to the Taluk office for tasks like applying for a new card, correcting errors in ration cards, adding new members, or removing members. Now, as everything in the country is being digitized, there is a way to apply for a new ration card online.
